title: A sermon preached at St Mary le Bow before the Lord Mayor, Court of Aldermen, & citizens of London, on Wednesday the 18th of June, a day appointed by Their Majesties, for a solemn monthly fast by John Tillotson ...
author: Tillotson, John, 1630-1694.
publisher: Printed for Brabazon Aylmer ..., Will. Rogers ..., and J. Tillotson ...,
